detail_desc: Striped, fine-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a cotton-blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a cotton-blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed zip in one side. Gathered flounce at the front that continues around the hem. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton and linen weave. Shirt with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Shorts with adjustable elastication and buttons at the waist, and side pockets.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a halterneck with ties at the back of the neck and a flounce at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a frilled seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Ankle-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce-trimmed seam with sewn-on ties at the waist. Unlined.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6//7/8.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a double-layered top with a tie detail and support panels in the bodice. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with broderie anglaise at the hem. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Cut-out sections under the bust and a tie detail at the top. Unlined.

Cold shoulder jumpsuit in a patterned weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill with narrow elastication over the arms. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs with a frill at the hems.

Short, sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a panel and frills at the front. Seam and drawstring at the waist and a wide broderie anglaise flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short wrapover blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, short flounced sleeves and ties at one side. Unlined.
Top in an airy weave with an embroidered pattern, lace details and lace shoulder straps. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with studs, a decorative bow at the front and adjustable fastening at the back. Width 1 cm.
Metal waist belt with an elastic strap and metal fastener at the back. Width 2.5 cm.
Waist belt in metal with sparkly stones. Adjustable length. Width 2.2 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a felted wool blend with a collar with an adjustable storm tab underneath and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Shoulder tabs with a button, loose yoke front and back with a button, side pockets and two inner pockets. Adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, seam centre front and asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, seam centre front and asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist and tassels at the hems.
Striped jumper in fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped jumper in fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and a text print on the coin and back pocket. Adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a flap chest pocket with a press-stud. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, and front and back pockets.
Knee-length shorts in an airy denim weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets,a back pocket and decorative seams at the knees.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed trim around the neckline. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Flap chest pocket with a fastener, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with shaping seams at the knees.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Short, A-line skirt woven in an airy cotton blend with embroidery. Elasticated waist and a layer of tulle underneath to create extra volume. Inner skirt woven in a cotton blend.

Sports bag that can be worn as a backpack in a patterned weave with two handles at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. One large outer compartment with a plastic fastener and two smaller outer compartments. Size 39x50 cm.
Purl-knit polo shirt in marled cotton with a collar, button placket, short sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front pockets in the side seams and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front pockets in the side seams and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

Padded jacket in a cotton and nylon blend with a ribbed, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Patterned canvas shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, and one zipped inner compartment. Size approx. 24x34x35 cm.
Patterned canvas shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, and one zipped inner compartment. Size approx. 24x34x35 cm.
Imitation leather shopper with imitation suede inside, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. One inner compartment with an additional zipped pocket. Unlined. Size approx. 13x33x41 cm.
Imitation leather shopper with imitation suede inside, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. One inner compartment with an additional zipped pocket. Unlined. Size approx. 13x33x41 cm.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud, patch front pockets and tapered legs with seams at the knees.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Plastic water bottle with a print motif, handle and a non-drip lid with a straw. Capacity 450 ml.
Round, folding hairbrush in plastic with a print motif. Mirror on the inside of the lid. Diameter 7 cm.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.

Spacious shoulder bag in nylon with imitation leather details, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. Concealed press-studs on the short sides that can be unfastened to make the bag more spacious, three inner compartments, one with a zip, and a reinforced base. Lined. Size 20.5x35.5x39.5 cm.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
